products.title: During the day, get added nutritive benefits from Kesaradi Oil and at night, let Manjish Glow Elixir work its magic!
products.description: Ein reichhaltiges, balsamartiges Gefühl. Meditativer Weihrauch und wärmende Vanille bilden eine berauschende Mischung, die einen spirituellen Nachduft und eine extrem feuchtigkeitsspendende, aber nicht klebrige Haut hinterlässt.

products.title: Reduces the appearance of saggy, crepey skin, especially on the arms and legs
products.description: Combining authentic ayurvedic recipes with the choicest herbs known for their enriching, youthifying, & glow-giving potential, this kit has everything your moisture-sapped, mature skin needs from head-to-toe.

products.title: The unique ingredients will give your skin a fresh looking complexion
products.description: Balaayah Black Gram removed Booster is a skin-firming, Ayurvedic body oil consciously made with 8 Ayurvedic herbs (along with Black Gram) to tighten the look of crepey, saggy skin on the body and intensely moisturize it.

products.title: Those with flat-looking, limp, chemically treated/damaged, lifeless hair.
products.description: This deeply nourishing, fast absorbing, non-greasy hair oil delivers results after the very first use. It imparts vibrant volume to thinning, limp hair bogged down by chemicals, pollution or dietary indiscretions.
